body.p: Prior to the publication of the 2018 Conceptual Framework, the definition of an asset included the term ‘resource’. The 2018 Conceptual Framework uses the term ‘economic resource’ and defines an economic resource and, hence, an asset as a right. To illustrate the effect of this change in emphasis, the 2018 Conceptual Framework states that, for a physical object, such as an item of property, plant and equipment, the economic resource is not the physical object but a set of rights over that object. Examples of such rights are listed in paragraph 4.11.
